name: SpaceBeaver
description:
SpaceBeaver

is unusual 2d-action in a circular room. You're playing as SpaceBeaver, who must defend his SpaceDam from evil aliens. Use your weapons and four powerful abilities to show enemies what's what and save the worl… SpaceBeaver.

Made in 72 hours specially for Ludum Dare 37.

Control:

  • 'A' & 'D' – move
  • Left Mouse – shoot
  • Wheel Down|Up or 1, 2, 3, 4 – choose a weapon
  • Q, W, E, R – use ability
Abilities:
  • Rocket Jump
Lead the sight in the right direction and push 'Q' to fly to the other side and show to evil, what's what!
  • Tail Strike
Press 'W' to do a melee attack and kick some enemy ass!
  • Rebound-bullets
Press 'E' and shoot at the walls! You will see that mistakes are not always bad things!
  • Slo-mo
Press 'R' if you think that the enemies are moving too fast!

Made by One Wing Cicada

We are grateful to the LITTLE ROBOT SOUND FACTORY
